m_descr: Create virtual device based on JSON data.
isNumerical_helper: If unchecked, data is interpreted as text
isFloat_helper: If unchecked, data is interpreted as integer. This setting only affects numerical data
needsAuth_helper: If checked, username/password parameters are required
regexp: Regular expression used to convert result
debug_helper: Caution: Only check this option for sending debug information to logfile
